name: TextRefine: ScoreEngine

name: KDI
description: Kubernetes Deployment Interface : A web interface that allows users to deploy applications on a Kubernetes cluster on the cloud.

name: Lichess Analysis Extension
description: An extension to jump from Lichess Analysis board to WintrCat's Game Report

description: Mobile app for the Expense Tracker application.

name: Transaction Categorization API
description: Categorize financial transactions using a fine-tuned BERT model. It provides endpoints to categorize single or multiple transactions.
